short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for San Antonio Express-News web producers that grabs content IDs to move from collection to collection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension provides a shortcut for web producers and editors of certain news websites to manage collections of stories within their CMS.

The extension gathers content ids from a page and formats them into a query string.
